id3TagStuff
Class ID3v2_XTag

java.lang.Object
  id3TagStuff.ID3v2_XTag

public class ID3v2_XTag
extends java.lang.Object

An ID3v2_XTag represents an entire ID3 tag. It can be artifically created from a fake mp3 file. It holds no information about the actual music data, save a copy of the file it was generated from.

Author:
Justin Nelson

Constructor Detail

ID3v2_XTag

public ID3v2_XTag(java.io.File mp3FileP)
           throws java.io.IOException
Creates a new ID3v2.X tag from a given mp3 file. The actual song data is not checked, nor is the file extension. No error is created if the song data is corrupt but the tag is correct. Various bad things may happen if the ID3 tag is missing or corrupt.

Parameters:
mp3FileP - The mp3 file that contains the tag to be created
Throws:
java.io.IOException
